structure.unit: ARTICLE CXV. GUIDELINES FOR ACHIEVING MAXIMUM FEDERAL MATCHING FUNDING FOR HEALTH, SOCIAL AND HUMAN SERVICES PROGRAMS

text.section:
Sec. 2-1755. Receipt of Federal Matching Funds.
Funds received by the County through the Federal Funds Maximization Program shall be disbursed by the Commission by a resolution in a manner that benefits the greatest number of Miami-Dade County residents in need of health, social and human services. The County shall maintain autonomy of revenue maximization funds for which it is awarded.
